attributes.additional_details:
WE want to keep this green field for the local people and wildlife as stepping stone for nature like Orrell and Scotsmans flash parks.WE dont want a Football club or the noise thats goes with it , the parking and the Pollution that goes with it. How can this be Eco ? A green breathing space is what we want . Since wigan council seems they want to build all around the Winstanley ward.
Save our field no to the Foottball club.
